data.author: Michael Atshuler
data.quote: The bad news is time flies. The good news is you’re the pilot.

data.author: Plato
data.quote: A work well begun is half-ended.

data.author: Jacob Riis
data.quote: When nothing seems to help, I go and look at a stonecutter hammering away at his rock, perhaps a hundred times without as much as a crack showing in it. Yet at the hundred and first blow it will split in two, and I know it was not that last blow that did it, but all that had gone before.

data.author: Edwin Markham
data.quote: We have committed the Golden Rule to memory; let us now commit it to life.

data.author: Mary Kay Ash
data.quote: Ideas are a dime a dozen. People who implement them are priceless.

data.author: Robert Greenleaf
data.quote: Purpose and laughter are the twins that must not separate. Each is empty without the other.

data.author: Woody Hayes
data.quote: The only thing even in this world is the number of hours in a day. The difference in winning or losing is what you do with those hours.

data.author: Tim Connor
data.quote: Life offers no guarantees... just choices; no certainty... but consequences; no predictable outcomes... just the privilege of pursuit.

data.author: Helen Keller
data.quote: No pessimist ever discovered the secret of the stars, or sailed to an uncharted land, or opened a new doorway for the human spirit.

data.author: Jim Rohn
data.quote: Discipline is the bridge between goals and accomplishment.

data.author: Unknown
data.quote: The dream is free. The hustle is sold separately.

data.author: Steve Jobs
data.quote: Remembering that you are going to die is the best way I know to avoid the trap of thinking you have something to lose. You are already naked. There is no reason not to follow your heart.

data.author: Maya Angelou
data.quote: You can’t use up creativity. The more you use, the more you have.

data.author: Marissa Mayer
data.quote: I always did something I was a little not ready to do. I think that’s how you grow. When there’s that moment of, ‘Wow, I’m not really sure I can do this,’ and you push through those moments, that’s when you have a breakthrough.

data.author: Patti Smith
data.quote: Never let go of that fiery sadness called desire.

data.author: Oprah Winfrey
data.quote: Challenges are gifts that force us to search for a new center of gravity. Don’t fight them. Just find a new way to stand.

data.author: Sheryl Sandberg
data.quote: What would you do if you weren’t afraid?

data.author: Muhammad Ali
data.quote: I don’t count my sit-ups; I only start counting when it starts hurting because they’re the only ones that count.

data.author: Stephen Hawking
data.quote: One, remember to look up at the stars and not down at your feet. Two, never give up work. Work gives you meaning and purpose and life is empty without it. Three, if you are lucky enough to find love, remember it is there and don’t throw it away.

data.author: Steve Jobs
data.quote: Innovation distinguishes between a leader and a follower.

data.author: Thomas Edison
data.quote: I have not failed. I’ve just found 10,000 ways that won’t work.

data.author: Ralph Waldo Emerson
data.quote: Do not go where the path may lead, go instead where there is no path and leave a trail.

data.author: John Wooden
data.quote: Things work out best for those who make the best of how things work out.

data.author: Jim Rohn
data.quote: If you are not willing to risk the usual, you will have to settle for the ordinary.

data.author: Arthur Ashe
data.quote: Start where you are. Use what you have. Do what you can.
